sentences: Ronaldo Folegatti (April 30, 1958, Rio de Janeiro  – August 1, 2007, Teresópolis) was a Brazilian composer, guitarist, and record producer.
In 2005 he released Jamming!, with guest appearances by Randy Brecker, Will Lee, Joel Rosenblatt  Zé Canuto, Teo Lima, Marcelo Martins, and Ada Rovatti.
